    • sendIrCommandRepeat

      public boolean sendIrCommandRepeat(String remote, String command, Transmitter transmitter) throws IOException, NoSuchTransmitterException
      Description copied from interface: IRemoteCommandIrSender
      Like sendIr, but sends the IR signal until stopped by stopIr. An implementation, or a hardware, may limit the number of repeats though.
